Characteristic.name: HID Information

InformativeText.Abstract: The HID Information Characteristic returns the HID attributes when read.
InformativeText.Summary: The HID Information Characteristic contains the HID attributes. The value of this Characteristic is static and can be cached for the lifetime of the bond between the HID device and the HID host.

Field.name: bcdHID
Field.InformativeText: 16-bit unsigned integer representing version number of base USB HID Specification implemented by HID Device

Field.name: bCountryCode
Field.InformativeText: Identifies which country the hardware is localized for. Most hardware is not localized and thus this value would be zero (0).
